name: Copperopolis
description:
In the year 1861 Copperopolis was a burgeoning mining town in the heart of California. Only a year earlier, as gold mines all over California dwindled, copper was discovered in the rolling hills and already competing mines were rushing for their claims. Amidst the chaos two local tycoons battle for control over the land...

https://copperopolis.netlify.app/
